scripts.bundle:ios: react-native rnx-bundle --platform ios --entry-file index.js --platform ios --bundle-output dist/ios/index.bundle --sourcemap-output dist/ios/index.bundle.map --assets-dest dist/ios --dev false --minify true
scripts.bundle:android: react-native rnx-bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output dist/android/index.bundle --sourcemap-output dist/android/index.bundle.map --assets-dest dist/android --dev false --minify true
scripts.ram-bundle:ios: react-native rnx-ram-bundle --platform ios --entry-file index.js --platform ios --bundle-output dist-ram/ios/index.bundle --sourcemap-output dist-ram/ios/index.bundle.map --assets-dest dist-ram/ios --dev false --minify true
scripts.ram-bundle:android: react-native rnx-ram-bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output dist-ram/android/index.bundle --sourcemap-output dist-ram/android/index.bundle.map --assets-dest dist-ram/android --dev false --minify true
scripts.ram-bundle1:ios: npx react-native ram-bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ram-bundle/ios/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest ram-bundle/ios/dist
scripts.ram-bundle1:android: npx react-native ram-bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ram-bundle/android/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ram-bundle/android/dist
scripts.bundle1:android: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output bundle/android/index.android.bundle --assets-dest bundle/android/dist
scripts.bundle1:ios: npx react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output bundle/ios/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest bundle/ios/dist
